## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type                                                       | Default       |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `hasPrefix` | `has-prefix` | Prefix      | `boolean`                                                  | `false`       |
| `hasSuffix` | `has-suffix` | suffix      | `boolean`                                                  | `false`       |
| `size`      | `size`       | Size        | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl"`                                | `TAG_SIZE`    |
| `status`    | `status`     | State       | `"error" \| "info" \| "neutral" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'info'`      |
